column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. THE ENEMY AIR DEFENSES ARE DOWN. PROCEED WITH THE PLAN. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO ALL FORCES. GO GO GO. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. AIRBASE HAS BEEN CAPTURE I REPEAT AIRBASE HAS BEEN CAPTURED. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. THE GUARD HOUSE IN SOUTH TIP IS CLEARED. MOVING TO SECURE MAIN BUILDINGS. OVER.
DELTA TO PAPA BEAR. COPY THAT. ENGAGING TARGET AREA. OVER.
DELTA TO PAPA BEAR. TANKS ARE WASTED. OVER.
CHARLIE TO ALPHA. DONE WITH SOUTHERN SECTION. MOVING TO SECURE THE CENTRAL AIRBASE. OVER.
CHARLIE TO ALPHA. CENTRAL SECTION SWEEPED. OVER.
CHARLIE REPORTING. NORTHERN SECTION OF THE AIRBASE SWEPT FROM ARMOR. LOOKS CLEAR. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER THAT. HOLD TIGHT SENDING GUNSHIPS. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO DELTA BLACK. COMMENCE THE AIR ASSAULT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALL FORCES. GOOD JOB. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
